original_title: Soft Cell - Soft Cell's Non-Stop Exotic Video Show
overview: Soft Cell's: Non-Stop Exotic Video Show is a collection of promotional films covering the career of British synth-pop duo, Soft Cell. It is a companion release to their debut album, Non-Stop Erotic Cabaret. The collection was originally issued on VHS in 1982 and re-issued on DVD in 2004. The DVD re-issue is slightly edited and removes some scenes and clips.
title: Soft Cell - Soft Cell's Non-Stop Exotic Video Show
